title: Firefox for Android 55.0.2 Release

notes.note:
Fix an issue with tab restoration ([Bug 1379374][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1379374

Blacklisting of Galaxy S4 SPH-L720 model for the adaptive playback feature ([Bug 1390022][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1390022

text:
We'd also like to extend a special thank you to all of the [new Mozillians][1] who contributed to this release of Firefox!

[1]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/2017/08/02/firefox-55-new-contributors/
system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide

*Note: Firefox for Android 55 is the last version that supports devices running Android 4.0.*
